long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Xplain-It is your ultimate companion for simplifying web content. This Chrome extension adds an "Explain" button next to every heading on a webpage. With just one click, it fetches the content under the heading and explains it in an easy-to-understand manner, ensuring you never feel lost while browsing. Perfect for students, professionals, and curious learners who want quick and clear explanations on the go
